body_html: Same in my case. I experienced a deadlock if I set up the num_workers=4. I use Ubuntu 17.10, Pytorch 0.3.1, CUDA 9.1, python 3.6. It is observed that there are 4 python threads, each of which occupies 1.6 GB memory while the CPU (4 cores) remains idle. Setting num_workers=0 helps to solve this issue.

body: Same in my case. I experienced a deadlock if I set up the num_workers=4. I use Ubuntu 17.10, Pytorch 0.3.1, CUDA 9.1, python 3.6. It is observed that there are 4 python threads, each of which occupies 1.6 GB memory while the CPU (4 cores) remains idle. Setting num_workers=0 helps to solve this issue.
